text: surat alfatihat sumiyat hadhih alswrt balfatht; li'anah yaftatih biha alquran alezym, wtsma almthany; li'anaha taqra fi kl rket, walaha 'asma' akhr. 'abtadi qra't alquran biaism allah msteyna bh, (allhi) eilm ealaa alrb -tbark wteala- almebwd bihaqi dun swah, wahu akhs 'asma' allah teala, wala yusamaa bih ghyrh sbhanh. (alrrahmani) dhi alrahmat aleamat aldhy wasieat rahmatih jmye alkhlq, (alrrahimi) balmwmnyn, wahuma aisman min 'asmayih teala, ytdmnan 'iithbat sifat alrahmat lilah taealaa kama ylyq bjlalh
